DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether different type online health tool aid overweight individual reduce weight manage cardiovascular risk factor context employee wellness program .
DOC.brief_title: Online Resources Manage Obesity Health Risks Employee Wellness Program
DOC.criteria: Vanderbilt University employee Completion 2009 Go For Gold Health Risk Assessment ( HRA ) Obesity define BMI > 30 Identification additional risk factor HRA either ( ) personal history diabetes , high blood pressure , high cholesterol ( b ) report cholesterol > = 240 mg/dl , blood glucose > = 126 mg/dl , systolic blood pressure > = 140 mm Hg , diastolic blood pressure > = 90 mm Hg Permission contact regard health HRA Pregnant females become pregnant prior completion study Age young 18 year old 65 year Non English speaking individual
